conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style 3D cutaway. Structural elements have clear verticality and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals with clean wall geometry and clear interior volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. Minor simplification of some window openings and slight wall length variation in the central hallway.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the plan, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen island seating.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials. Deduction of 1 point for somewhat dark shadows in deep corners.

detected_errors.description: Some specific window cutouts on the top perimeter wall are simplified compared to the precise CAD lines.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that meticulously maintains the room configuration and furniture layout of the 2D architectural drawing.
